le-txt: @1 es ingeniera y la primera mujer y asiática elegida como Senior Fellow en Texas Instruments.
evelyn-txt: @1 es una pionera de la informática y la segunda persona afroamericana en obtener un doctorado en matemáticas.
adele-txt: @1 is an american computer scientist and educator and co-developer of the Smalltalk programming language.
rosza-txt: @1 was an hungarian mathematician. Founding mother of recursion.
nashlie-txt: @1 is an American computer engineer and entrepreneur specialized in machine learning and algorithmic bias identification.
